skins.shipDescription: Sixth ship of Hatsuharu class Destroyer¡ª Yuugure
skins.selfIntroduction: Second ship of Ariake class Destroyer, Yuugure. A lot of people thinks that my sister and I are Hatsuharu class, but they are mistaken. My sister and I participated in many battles in the South Pacific. We helped protect the 4th and 5th Carrier Divisions. We were greatly taken care of by Akashi. This time...I will stay by my sister¡¯s side until the very end.
skins.acquisition: Ariake class Destroyer Yuugure. I am open to your guidance, Lord Commander¡ª¡ª Hatsuharu? No, please do remember I'm Ariake class. This is something I won't back down from!
skins.login: Lord Commander, you¡¯ve worked hard today.
skins.details: Umm... exactly what do I need to do, to be able to see my sister again?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Rumor has it that we would be able to finish our mission before the pot of tea that we brew got cold? Eh, is this wine?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Even if there is only the slimmest of hope, as long as you persevere, one day you will make it a reality.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Is Hiyou coming? She has a mischievous look about her, I¡¯m a little worried.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Lord Commander, what are you doing!

skins.shipDescription: Ariake-class destroyer, Yuugure, has completed retrofitting. Ehehe, from now on... Ariake and I will be in your care once more, Commander.
skins.acquisition: Ariake-class destroyer, Yuugure, has completed retrofitting. Ehehe, from now on... Ariake and I will be in your care once more, Commander.
skins.details: Here you go, Commander. Um, your tea! It's Ariake's favorite kind, but I do not know if it will be to your liking or not...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I feel like I've gotten a little taller after my retrofit... and it makes Ariake seem shorter in comparison... Ugh...
skins.secretaryIdle2: (whispers) Hatsushimo, you'll trouble Commander if you do that! ...I-I wasn't saying anything!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wakaba, Commander, I have some walnut daifuku for you. Um, huh...? You don't need the wrapping...?

skins.shipDescription: "I, Yuugure the maid, shall dedicate myself to Ariake, my sister, and you, Commander!"... Eek?! M-my skirt...!
skins.acquisition: "I, Yuugure the maid, shall dedicate myself to Ariake, my sister, and you, Commander!"... Eek?! M-my skirt...!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. I've left your juice over here. As for the resources... I'm still sorting them... I'm sorry...
skins.details: Commander, Belfast taught me a lot about being a maid! ... But if Ariake saw me now, she'd probably be... shocked.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Edinburgh taught me a lot as well... She seemed to make a number of mistakes, but I still appreciate her kindness!
skins.secretaryIdle3: As soon as Mikasa saw me, she yelled "Scandalous! Taisho-era servitors would never wear skirts this frilly!"... Even though I wasn't born in the Taisho-era...
skins.secretaryTouch: Phew... I'm done sorting the resources... Now for the next task...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Commander, please don't do such things to me!

skins.shipDescription: The Dragon Empery's New Year celebrations and new outfits are sure to lift everyone's spirits~ My sister will probably love this new dress as well. What do you think, Commander?
skins.acquisition: The Dragon Empery's New Year celebrations and new outfits are sure to lift everyone's spirits~ My sister will probably love this new dress as well. What do you think, Commander?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. I'm about to go wish my sister a happy new year, as is customary in the Dragon Empery... Would you like to come with me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Do they eat New Year's rice cake in the Dragon Empery as well? Perhaps they just eat whatever they feel like eating.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A red envelope from you? Please don't forget to give one to my sister as well.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, our dreams will come true this year... right? N-no, I'm sure they will!
skins.secretaryTouch: I have to tell my sister about all the customs I learned from the Dragon Empery!

skins.shipDescription: I finished changing, Commander. This dress is very pretty, but... isn't it missing something up top?
skins.acquisition: I finished changing, Commander. This dress is very pretty, but... isn't it missing something up top?
skins.login: I've heard parties are "a world of fun for adults." C-Commander, could you accompany me to this "world of fun for adults"...?
skins.details: When a girl wears a different outfit, your impression of her changes, doesn't it? I hope they can make a different outfit for Ariake, too...
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's beautiful when flower petals flicker in the wind, but also a little sad, in a way... Do you know what I mean, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I-I'm fine with just juice! ... Ah, thank you!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I feel like maybe I should bring back some sweets for Ariake... Huh? Am I not allowed to...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Once I've grown a little more, I'll be able to keep my composure even in places like these.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: What's the matter...? "Am I nervous"? I-I'm fine... I think... It's just a bit embarrassing to show myself wearing these clothes to others...
